name: RCP Ringtone Design
tag_list: ring, tones, ringtones, ringtone, business, standard, normal, basic, classic, iphone, android, blackberry, palm, mobile, phone, rings
overview:
RCP Ringtone Design creates simple and elegant ringtones for modern smartphones. From business phone rings to electronic beeps and blips, meditative chimes and custom SMS tones, RCP provides the ringtones that should have come default with your phone.

RCP Tones are available for iPhone, Android, Blackberry, Palm, as well as many other devices, and are mastered specifically for tiny mobile phone speakers. You can find their best-selling ring tones at rcptones.com, in the Android Market, Blackberry App World, and posted for free at their Twitter and Facebook pages.
